description: This file contains functions and logic for managing workspaces in the 'agno' project, including creating, setting up, starting, stopping, updating, and deleting workspaces, as well as setting a workspace as active. It interacts with various components such as schemas, configurations, and external resources, and references multiple external modules and APIs.

methods.name: create_workspace
methods.description: Creates a new workspace, cloning a template or URL, and sets up the workspace directory and configuration.

methods.name: setup_workspace
methods.description: Sets up an existing workspace directory by creating or updating its configuration and schema, including Git remote retrieval and user creation.

methods.name: start_workspace
methods.description: Starts resources within a workspace, deploying resource groups and logging the event.

methods.name: stop_workspace
methods.description: Stops resources within a workspace, deleting resource groups and logging the event.

methods.name: update_workspace
methods.description: Updates resources within a workspace and logs the update event.

methods.name: delete_workspace
methods.description: Deletes specified workspaces from the configuration.

methods.name: set_workspace_as_active
methods.description: Sets a specified workspace as the active workspace in the configuration.
